repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:6.9.3
MAINTAINER Azure App Services Container Images <appsvc-images@microsoft.com>

# Create app directory
WORKDIR /app

# Install app dependencies
COPY package.json .

RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

# Bundle app source
COPY . .

EXPOSE 8080 80
CMD [ "npm", "start" ]
